item.title: Salesforce Analytics Cloud
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Salesforce Statement https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000363736&type=1 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov “Analytics Cloud is reported to be affected by CVE-2021-44228. Services have been updated to mitigate the issues identified in CVE-2021-44228 and we are executing our final validation steps.” CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
